name: Conference Speaker and Microphone, 10 AI Mics 360° Voice Pick Up & Noise Reduction, USB Speakerphone for 10-15 People Conference Room, Compatible with Multi-Leading Platforms, Zoom, MS Team
short_description: Leading technology：When it comes to wireless performance, our conference room microphone doesn’t just lead—it redefines the standard. Enjoy seamless connectivity and studio-worthy sound, all while moving freely up to an impressive 20 meters (that’s 65 feet!). Whether you’re performing, presenting, meeting，etc; every word, note, or nuance comes through with stunning clarity: crisp highs, rich midtones, and zero distortion.Unlike many competitors, whose microphones are stuck with a meager 20 feet (around 6 meters) of range. Roam further, speak louder, or sound clearer—without dropouts

Premium Voice-Chip Technology: Be it an echo-laden conference room or a busy open workspace, our proprietary VoiceIA Chip Technology utilizes deep learning to isolate your voice from ambient noise interference—ensuring your clients and colleagues receive nothing but your voice with exceptional clarity.

360° Voice Pick Up 65ft Away Via 10 High-Sensitivity AI Mics: BALILA conference speakerphone features 10 AI omnidirectional mics, capturing sound from all angles. With a 65ft range, presenters move freely while staying clearly heard—boosted by real-time echo cancellation, dereverberation, and ambient noise suppression

Crystal-Clear Audio Performance: BALILA conference call speaker and microphone with 5W premium speaker can deliver evenly distributed sound across the room—ensuring no details go unheard. Featuring full-duplex audio, it produces natural, rich sound that creates an in-person conversation experience.

Easy Set up & Broad Compatibility: The conference speaker can connect to various devices in seconds via USB C/TYPE C, without the need for any drivers， wihich offers a lightspeed connection and low latency for smooth real-time communication. BALILA conference speaker and microphone is universally compatible with Windows, Mac OS, iOS, and Android, and works seamlessly with mainstream meeting platforms such as Zoom, Microsoft for Teams, Skype for Business, and more.

Long Battery Life for Optimal Performance - Equipped with a large capacity battery, the BALILA conference speaker with microphone supports long-term calls over 10 hours of talk time on a single charge, making it perfect for all-day meetings. The USB Conference Speakerphone is optimal for use in the meeting room, home office, or on business trips, ensuring that you always have a professional meeting experience.

2 Year Warranty Policy: At BALILA, we prioritize customer satisfaction above all else. We strongly encourage you to carefully follow the provided instructions for the computer speaker and microphone to ensure optimal performance. Our dedicated team is available 24/7 to address any queries or concerns you may have and provide a 2 year warranty policy

name: ZealSound Podcast Microphone for PC, Noise Cancellation USB Mic with Gain, Volume Adjustment & Mute Button, Monitoring & Echo, for YouTube, TikTok, Podcasting, Streaming, iPhone, iPad, Android, Mac
short_description: Studio-Quality Sound for Clear Podcast Recording – The K66 USB podcast microphone delivers studio-quality, broadcast-level audio using a high-performance condenser capsule and cardioid pickup pattern that focuses on your voice while reducing unwanted background noise. Designed as a reliable microphone for PC, it features a wide 40Hz–18kHz frequency response and a 46kHz sampling rate to reproduce rich lows, smooth mids, and clear highs for natural, detailed vocals. With –45dB ±3dB sensitivity, it captures balanced sound without distortion during expressive speaking. Ideal for podcasting, voice-over, online classes, meetings, and professional content creation.

Intelligent Noise Reduction Mode for Cleaner Podcast Audio – This podcast microphone features an advanced Noise Reduction Mode designed for clearer, more focused voice recording in real-world environments. Press and hold the mute button to enable noise reduction (blue indicator). In this mode, the microphone helps reduce keyboard clicks, PC fan noise, air conditioner hum, and background chatter. Default Mode maintains a warm, natural vocal tone for quiet spaces. Designed as a reliable microphone for PC, it allows creators to identify the active mode instantly and adapt as needed, ensuring clear audio for podcasting, gaming, streaming, online classes, meetings, and recording.

True Plug-and-Play USB Microphone with Wide Device Compatibility – Engineered for effortless plug-and-play use, the K66 USB microphone requires no drivers, apps, or software installation. Simply connect and start recording on Windows PC, Mac, laptops, PS4, PS5, and tablets. Included USB-C and Lightning adapters ensure seamless compatibility with iPhone, iPad, and modern USB-C phones and devices, making it easy to switch between desktop and mobile recording. Ideal for creators working across multiple platforms, this microphone delivers consistent, high-quality audio for YouTube, TikTok, Twitch, Zoom, Discord, OBS Studio, Streamlabs, podcasting, livestreaming, and professional voice recording.

Real-Time Zero-Latency Monitoring with Adjustable Volume Control – This podcast microphone features real-time, zero-latency monitoring through a built-in 3.5mm headphone jack, allowing you to hear exactly what’s being recorded without delay. Designed as a reliable microphone for PC, it includes a dedicated monitoring volume control that lets you adjust headphone listening levels independently for accurate and comfortable audio monitoring. Real-time feedback helps identify distortion, background noise, or uneven volume before it affects your final recording, making this podcast microphone ideal for podcasting, streaming, online teaching, voice-over work, and professional content creation.

Precision Audio Adjustment Knobs for Full Sound Control – This podcast microphone gives creators hands-on control with dedicated knobs for microphone volume, monitoring volume, and echo adjustment. Fine-tune mic gain to maintain clear, balanced vocal output, adjust headphone monitoring levels independently for comfortable listening, and add or reduce echo to enhance depth and presence. Designed as a reliable PC microphone, these intuitive physical controls allow fast, on-the-fly adjustments without software, helping identify distortion, background noise, or level inconsistencies instantly. Ideal for podcasting, streaming, ASMR, voice-overs, singing, and professional multi-platform recording.

Instant Mute with Clear LED Indicator – The built-in instant mute button provides fast, discreet audio control with a single press, making it easy to mute yourself during podcast recording, Zoom meetings, Discord calls, livestreams, gaming sessions, interviews, and online classes. A clear red LED indicator shows mute status at a glance, helping prevent accidental audio transmission and protect privacy. Ideal for podcasters, remote workers, educators, streamers, gamers, and content creators who need reliable, quick-access mute control.

Adjustable Echo Control for Creative or Clean Recording – The dedicated echo control knob allows you to add subtle ambiance or richer vocal depth in real time, enhancing your voice for livestreams, performances, and creative recordings. Easily reduce or turn off echo when clean, natural sound is required for podcast recording, voice-over, or meetings, or increase it for more expressive delivery during singing, gaming, or live interaction. This built-in control eliminates the need for external software or effects, making it easy to customize your sound instantly. Ideal for podcasters, streamers, voice actors, and PC-based creators who want flexible sound shaping without complicated setup.

360° Rotatable Top-Addressed Design with Stable Metal Base – Designed as a top-addressed podcast microphone, the K66 captures optimal sound when you speak directly into the top, ensuring clear and consistent voice pickup. The 360-degree rotatable body allows flexible positioning to suit different desk setups, angles, and recording styles. Its solid metal construction and weighted base provide excellent stability and vibration resistance, helping reduce unwanted movement during recording or streaming. Designed as a reliable mic for podcasting, this durable, adjustable build supports comfortable long-term use for podcasting, voice recording, online classes, and professional content creation.

All-in-One Microphone Solution for Every Type of Creator – Built to support creators at every level, the K66 microphone combines a cardioid pickup pattern, wide 40Hz–18kHz frequency response, intelligent noise reduction, and zero-latency monitoring into one reliable microphone. Compatible with popular platforms and software including OBS Studio, Streamlabs, Discord, GarageBand, Audacity, TikTok, YouTube, and more, it integrates seamlessly into any recording or livestream setup. Whether you’re producing podcasts, teaching online courses, streaming gameplay, creating ASMR content, or recording vocals, this microphone delivers consistent, professional performance across all use cases.

Complete Accessory Package for Instant Professional Setup – The K66 podcast microphone includes a full accessory package designed for immediate, hassle-free use. Inside the box, you’ll find a professional-grade microphone, a solid metal anti-vibration stand base for stability, a long 70.87-inch USB audio cable, a USB-C adapter for modern devices, a Lightning adapter for iPhone and iPad, and a foam windscreen to help reduce plosive noise. A user manual and free technical support are included to ensure smooth setup and long-term reliability, providing a complete, ready-to-use recording solution for PC and mobile creators.

name: Bluetooth Wireless Headset, Dual Mic AI Noise Reduction, 500mAh Charging Case 72H Talk Time for Truckers Home Office PC Smartphone Business Use
short_description: 58dB Deep AI Noise Cancellation with QCC 3046 Chip for Distortion-Free Calls: Engineered with the premium QCC 3046 chip and dual AI-powered noise-canceling microphones, this Ngsod wireless headset achieves a remarkable 58dB noise reduction performance—outperforming the 45dB industry average by a wide margin. It effectively filters out disruptive background noises from noisy truck cabs, crowded streets, or bustling offices, ensuring every word of your calls is transmitted and received with crystal clarity, no matter where you are.

USB Dongle Included for Lag-Free PC/Laptop Connection & Zero Interference: Package comes with an exclusive USB dongle that enables one-to-one stable pairing with your desktop or laptop. This dedicated connection eliminates Bluetooth signal interference from nearby devices, eradicates annoying audio delays and intermittent sound glitches. It’s the ultimate choice for remote work conferences, online training sessions, and long-haul trucking communication that demands uninterrupted audio quality.

Hands-Free Control & Independent Mute Key for Effortless Operation: The multi-functional MFB button allows full control over your headset: answer, decline, hang up or redial calls; play, pause music tracks; switch between previous/next songs; and seamlessly toggle audio between your phone and headset. The standalone mute button (functional during phone calls only) streamlines call muting and also supports Siri voice assistant activation—freeing up your hands for safe driving or efficient typing, perfectly suited for truck drivers and office professionals.

500mAh Charging Case with LED Digital Display & 200H Extended Standby: Built with a high-capacity 500mAh charging case, this Bluetooth headset is specially designed for long-haul truckers and frequent business travelers who need reliable power on the go. The intuitive LED digital screen lets you instantly check the charging case’s remaining battery level (note: headset battery level is not displayed), so you never face unexpected power shortages during extended trips or busy workdays.

Universal Compatibility for All Scenarios & Multi-Device Use: Effortlessly pairs with smartphones, PCs, laptops, and all other Bluetooth-enabled devices, delivering flexible connectivity for diverse usage scenarios. Whether you’re navigating long truck routes, working from home, attending online classes, or commuting daily, this headset serves as a dependable all-in-one companion that caters to all your communication and audio entertainment needs.
